name: Union
description: Takes two or more polygons and returns a combined polygon. If the input polygons are not contiguous, this function returns a MultiPolygon feature.

name: Difference
description: Finds the difference between two polygons by clipping the second polygon from the first.

name: Buffer
description: Calculates a buffer for input features for a given radius.

name: Scale
description: Scales a feature by a given percentage.

name: Rotate
description: Rotates any Feature around its centroid by a specified angle.

name: CenterPoint
description: Takes a Feature or FeatureCollection and returns the absolute center point of all features.

name: CalculateArea
description: Takes one or more features and returns their area.

name: Simplify
description: Takes a feature and returns a simplified version.

name: Split
description: Splits a Polygon by another Line Feature.

name: CalculateShortestLine
description: Takes a shortest line of the given features.

name: CalculateLength
description: Calculates the length of the given Line feature.

name: LineOnLine
description: Clips a line on the line between a start point and end distance.

name: Clip
description: Gets feature for clipping other features.

name: ConvexHull
description: Takes a Feature or a FeatureCollection and returns a convex hull Polygon.

name: Snapping
description: Snaps a Feature a feature with a given distance.

name: EnvelopBoundingbox
description: Takes any number of features and returns a rectangular Polygon that encompasses all vertices.
